Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Torca/Ratchet:::

::he sees Klant::
Torca: Klant, quit putting yourself down like that, you get better soon. And 
thats why i have this for you.
::He hands him a gun that looks just like his own dorsal gun::
Torca: This baby can fire any kind of artillary you want, it'll probably give 
you an edge in battle. But remember something: It is just a weapon.  The 
warrior who uses it is more important. Understand what im saying?
~~~~~
::Ratchet had a deep frown on his face::
Ratchet: Well, together we can fix it. Rhinox, mind letting me help?

--part1_16.8688688.27aff838_boundary
